title: Social Media Buzz: From The Oscars To Georgia Death Row Inmate
teaser: Buzzfeed news editor Rachel Zarrell joins us for a look at how the news is reverberating on social media.
contentencoded:
Buzzfeed news editor Rachel Zarrell and Here & Now’s Robin Young look at how the news is reverberating on social media, including a number of moments from last night’s Oscars, and a female death row inmate in Georgia who is set to be executed this week.

[Youtube]

Guest

  • Rachel Zarrell, news editor at Buzzfeed. She tweets @rachelzarrell.
